senses.sense_definition: Located or situated in front of the lower jaw.

examples.text: The researcher examined the <w>premandibular</w> arch to understand the early development of the skull.
Muscles in the <w>premandibular</w> region are crucial for the feeding mechanisms of certain fish larvae.

senses.sense_definition: A specific bone found in front of the lower jaw in certain reptiles.

examples.text: The fossil specimen included a well-preserved <w>premandibular</w> that helped identify the species.
Anatomy students learned how the <w>premandibular</w> connects to the rest of the jaw structure in lizards.
